metadata.name: MT287

papers.title: A Word at a Time: Computing Word Relatedness using Temporal Semantic Analysis

metadata.description: Human labeled examples of word semantic relatedness. The data pairs were generated using an algorithm as described in the paper by [K. Radinsky, E. Agichtein, E. Gabrilovich, S. Markovitch.]. Each pair of words was evaluated by 10 people on a scale of 1-5.
